main event: On 8 December 1961, a bright orange unidentified flying object was observed at Tyndall Air Force Base, Florida. The object was described as moving from west to east at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was reported to be approximately 30-75 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for around 30 seconds to 10 minutes depending on the observer, Multiple witnesses included military personnel,Weather conditions were clear with good visibility,The object was tracked on radar at speeds exceeding 2000 knots.
location: Tyndall Air Force Base, Florida, USA
witness description: LT COL J.D. ANDERSON, LT P.H. CRIBBS, and other military personnel
